summary:
Material Information Summary

Acquisition & Capital Raising Announcement

  • Acquisition: Xero to acquire 100% of Melio (US SMB bill pay platform) for US$2.5B (A$3.9B) upfront (cash + scrip), plus up to US$0.5B in contingent payments.
  • Funding:
  • Placement: A$1.85B (fully underwritten) at A$176/share (9.4% discount to last close).
  • SPP: Target ~A$200M, max A$30k per shareholder, priced at lower of Placement Price or 2% discount to 5-day VWAP post-close.
  • Debt: US$0.4B revolving credit facility.
  • Cash: US$0.6B from balance sheet.
  • Valuation: Melio valued at 13.4x FY25 annualized revenue (US$187M) or 9.7x including FY28 revenue synergies (US$70M).
  • Pro Forma Leverage: Net debt/EBITDA ~2.3x post-transaction.
  • Synergies: Targeted US$70M revenue + US$20M cost savings by FY28.
  • Strategic Rationale: Accelerates US growth; combined entity aims to double Xero’s FY25 group revenue by FY28.

Key Timetable

  • SPP Record Date: 24 June 2025.
  • Placement Settlement: 30 June 2025.
  • SPP Close: 21 July 2025.
  • SPP Allotment: 28 July 2025.

Conditions

  • Regulatory approvals (US antitrust, money transmitter licenses).
  • Break fee of US$37.5M if deal fails due to HSR rejection.

Omitted: Operational details, management commentary, legal disclaimers.

• Trading Halt Reason: Pending announcement of a corporate transaction and associated equity raising.
  • Halt Duration: Until the earlier of:
  • Completion of institutional component announcement or
  • Commencement of trading on 26 June 2025.
